dmca.title: RE: Copyright Violations:  Remove this advertising and links, etc. [GREYLODGE.ORG@dom
dmca.body:
From: emailservice@domainsbyproxy.com [mailto:emailservice@domainsbyproxy.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, April 17, 2007 2:39 AM
Subject: FWD: Copyright Violations: Remove this advertising and links, etc. [GREYLODGE.ORG@domainsbyproxy.com]

We believe this individual to be and has possibly been engaging in illegal activity as stated below.  As you are hosting his site, we are duly notifying you of this possible and alleged activity so that you may investigate it on your servers as we intend to prosecute any and all violators.  As the host isp, you are now notified according to the requirements of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998, under which your country is covered under the WIPO treaties.  If you'd like more information, please go to:  http://www.loc.gov/copyright/legislation/hr2281.pdf

   I have a good faith belief that use of the material in the manner described is accurate, and is not authorized by the copyright owner, or me, his agent, or the law.  
   This notice is accurate and I am, under penalty of perjury, authorized to act on behalf of Richard Bandler, Bandler
